methods.name: glm::proj2D
methods.parameters: const glm::mat3 &m=P, const glm::vec3 &normal=P
methods.short: Build planar projection matrix along normal axis. From GLM_GTX_transform2 extension.

methods.name: glm::proj3D
methods.parameters: const glm::mat4 &m=P, const glm::vec3 &normal=P
methods.short: Build planar projection matrix along normal axis. From GLM_GTX_transform2 extension.
Build a scale bias matrix. From GLM_GTX_transform2 extension.
Build a scale bias matrix. From GLM_GTX_transform2 extension.

methods.name: glm::shearX2D
methods.parameters: const glm::mat3 &m=P, T y
methods.short: Transforms a matrix with a shearing on X axis. From GLM_GTX_transform2 extension.

methods.name: glm::shearX3D
methods.parameters: const glm::mat4 &m=P, T y, T z
methods.short: Transforms a matrix with a shearing on X axis From GLM_GTX_transform2 extension.

methods.name: glm::shearY2D
methods.parameters: const glm::mat3 &m=P, T x
methods.short: Transforms a matrix with a shearing on Y axis. From GLM_GTX_transform2 extension.

methods.name: glm::shearY3D
methods.parameters: const glm::mat4 &m=P, T x, T z
methods.short: Transforms a matrix with a shearing on Y axis. From GLM_GTX_transform2 extension.

methods.name: glm::shearZ3D
methods.parameters: const glm::mat4 &m=P, T x, T y
methods.short: Transforms a matrix with a shearing on Z axis. From GLM_GTX_transform2 extension.
